item.title: The many beautiful worlds of Cellular Automata
item.description: I’ve been interested in Cellular Automata (such as ‘Conway’s Game of Life’) for years. I’ve implemented them countless times in various programming languages. A couple of weeks back I created a Dart library for exploring playing with Cellular Automata, it’s open source and available on Github. You can browse the demos on github or see the library running on my personal website -the gifs on this article were also generated using the library.
